Uses of Package
org.alljoyn.ns

  • Packages that use org.alljoyn.ns 
    Package Description
    org.alljoyn.ns
    The package includes API classes of the Notification service which are used to send and receive notification messages
  • Classes in org.alljoyn.ns used by org.alljoyn.ns 
    Class and Description
    Notification
    The Notification that is sent over the network
    NotificationMessageType
    Notification message types
    NotificationReceiver
    An interface to be implemented in order to receive notification messages
    NotificationSender
    The class is used to trigger sending a notification
    NotificationService
    The entry point of the Notification service
    The class is a singleton
    NotificationServiceException
    The exception is thrown if a NotificationService failure has occurred
    NotificationText
    NotificationText.
    RichAudioUrl
    RichNotificationAudioUrl.
